summary: "Moby-Dick" is an epic novel by Herman Melville, published in 1851. It follows sailor Ishmael as he joins Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to hunt down Moby Dick, a giant whale that bit off Ahab's leg. The book combines adventure with deep thoughts about life, good and evil, and God. Melville wrote it using his experiences as a sailor and stories about real whales like Mocha Dick. Though it was not popular at first, "Moby-Dick" is now considered a great American novel.
title: Moby-Dick
